title.rendered: HP 14 (2021) 11th Gen Intel Core i3 Laptop with Alexa Built-in, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 14-Inch (35.6 cm) FHD Screen, Windows 10, MS Office, (14s-…

content.rendered:
• Free upgrade to Windows 11 when available* Disclaimer-*The Windows 11 upgrade will be delivered late 2021 into 2022. Timing varies by device. Certain features require specific hardware.
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (up to 4.1 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, 6 MB L3 cache, 2 cores)
  • Memory: 8 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (2 x 4 GB), upgradable up to 16 GB (2 x 8 GB) | Storage: 256 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD
  • Display: 14-Inch (35.6 cm) FHD IPS micro-edge, 250 nits, 45% NTSC (1920 x 1080)
  • Operating System & Software: Pre-loaded Windows 10 Home with lifetime validity | Pre-installed Microsoft Office Home & Student 2019, Alexa Built-in
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
